lines.text: Well, speaking of spiders - are you sure rifles are just the thing? Insects have a pretty simple nervous system, sheriff. You could plug holes in one all day and never hit a vital spot. If you want to be on the safe side, call the pest control people in Springdale and have 'em send out all the DDT they can find.

[to a deputy after finding a desiccated body in a cave]
Uh, you get back to town and make up a coroner's report. Just put down Jack Flynn as the name and the cause of death... uh...
It was a spider drained all the liquid out of his body.

[Officiously]
Just put down "cause unknown" and let the coroner worry about the rest. That's the trouble with you eggheads - you jump to conclusions! I know what I see and I see a dead man, but, uh, I don't see any spider.

[to Mrs. Kingman]
It'd be a good idea if you'd stay inside the house for awhile.
Hey I just remembered, I've got a candy bar with me!
